questions.stem_html: What did research show about the initial claims of Edward Sapir and Benjamin Whorf that language entirely determined the cognitive process of the individual?

answers.content_html: Research conclusively demonstrated that their hypothesis applied to all cultures.
Research on the Sapir-Whorf hypothesis is inconclusive.
Research showed that the Sapir-Whorf hypothesis described the impact of language on aboriginal cultures, but not on other cultures.
Research did not support their initial claim
